dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I've finally found the lost temple. But something feels off...

dialogues.speaker: Guardian of the Temple
dialogues.text: You shouldn't be here. Leave now, and you might live.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: I'm not going anywhere. I've come too far to turn back now.

dialogues.speaker: Guardian of the Temple
dialogues.text: Very well, mortal. Then you shall face my trial.
